search_templates.query: Search for off-the-plan and project marketing real estate agents in {city}. Find agents who specialize in selling new apartment developments for developers. Include both senior directors AND junior sales executives/associates who do high-volume prospecting.

Find real estate agents in {city} who sell properties for developers at CBRE Residential, Colliers Residential, JLL Residential, Knight Frank, Savills. Include project sales managers, sales executives, and BDMs who prospect and call leads.

Search for the highest selling real estate agents in {city} Australia. Find agents ranked in top 100 lists, REB rankings, or known for selling large volumes. Include both established performers and rising stars.

Find young, high-performing real estate agents in {city} who are rising stars or have won rising star/young achiever awards. Look for agents under 35 who are known for high activity, lots of listings, or innovative approaches.
Find agents at boutique real estate agencies in {city}. Include principals AND their high-performing sales agents, associates, and BDMs. Look for independent agencies with active sales teams.
Search for luxury property agents in {city} selling $2M+ homes. Include both senior agents and their associates/junior partners who handle prospecting and buyer inquiries.

Find Business Development Managers (BDMs), listing agents, and prospecting specialists at real estate agencies in {city}. These are agents who focus on cold calling, door knocking, and generating new listings.

Find real estate sales associates and sales executives in {city} who work under senior agents. These are typically younger professionals who handle high volumes of buyer and seller inquiries, open homes, and follow-up calls.
